title: Busy At School
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 48 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 160L
description: Have you ever stopped to think about all the things you do at school every day? In Busy At School, readers learn about the many things busy students do at school. Engaging photos support the text.
highFrequencyWords: a, are, at, the, they, to
reviewWords: busy, children, count, game, numbers, picture, school, share, snacks, song, story, toys
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /s/ sounds
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Use high-frequency words a, are, at, the, they, to
